definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: The Jiangsu cooking style is known for its wide variety of ingredients and sweetish flavor.
sentences.chinese: 苏菜以其佐料的多样性和甜味而有名。

sentences.english: Even babies like sugar—and lots of it.
sentences.chinese: 就连是婴儿也喜欢甜味食，而且还是大量的甜食。

sentences.english: The berry is nutritious and has a sweetish taste.
sentences.chinese: 浆果有营养并且有一种带甜味的口味。

sentences.english: Manna was a sweet gum or resin type of bread that God supernaturally sent from Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 吗哪是一种神从天上降下的甜味薄并。

sentences.english: I think I'll have a Dry Sherry instead of the kirsch.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一杯没有甜味的雪利酒，不要樱桃酒。

sentences.english: They compared the so-called sweet-blind mice to normal mice.
sentences.chinese: 他们用这种“甜味盲”老鼠与正常老鼠做比较。

sentences.english: It is more stable than APM, which considerably widens the potential application of NTM.
sentences.chinese: 纽甜甜味纯正，比阿斯巴甜稳定，因而应用范围更广。

sentences.english: The sweet taste is provided by using a sweetening effective amount of sucralose in the composition.
sentences.chinese: 甜味是在组合物中添加有效量的三氯半乳蔗糖获得的。

sentences.english: This article discussed the character of sweeteners and the application of sweeteners in ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了各种甜味料的特性及其在冰淇淋中的应用。

sentences.english: Saccharin, the oldest artificial sweetener, was first produced in 1879.
sentences.chinese: 糖精，最古老的甜味剂，于1879年初次生产。

sentences.english: Professor Schlein led the sweet bait research.
sentences.chinese: Schlein教授领导了这项甜味诱饵研究。

sentences.english: And you can cut down fat and sugar more by using skim milk and an artificial sweetener.
sentences.chinese: 并且可以使用脱脂奶和人工甜味剂减少脂肪和糖。

sentences.english: Free from preservatives, alcohol, artificial flavouring, sweeteners, and colourings.
sentences.chinese: 不含防腐剂，酒精，野生香料，甜味剂和色素。

sentences.english: If desired, add sugar or sweetener to taste.
sentences.chinese: 根据个人喜好，可以加糖或其他甜味料。

sentences.english: And within about ten minutes, even the sweet-blind mice preferred the sugar water.
sentences.chinese: 十分钟之内，“甜味盲”老鼠竟然也喜欢糖水。

sentences.english: The sweetness left on the tongue is the final gain of a lifetime of struggle.
sentences.chinese: 最后留在齿遐的甜味恰是终了所得。

definition: taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
